channel.title: Question About Webclient (if it possible)
channel.description:
K,so i have uploaded All my files from the client galkon on my site.But when i try to load java start perfect then there only a red X on page.I checked Tools then java console(it was clean before)And look what it say
load: class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) It say class not found. so i tryed sumting with jar maker.
[URL=http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image=imaggggri8.png][IMG]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/339/imaggggri8.th.png[/img][/URL]
So i changed the input directory to my website where class are but it wont let me create the jar.
Is there a way i can do ??if not can any1 gimme a WORKING TuT link for Webclient?? ps:im french.

item.title: Question About Webclient (if it possible)
item.dc:creator: @tayshikozz tayshikozz
item.description:
@tayshikozz wrote:

K,so i have uploaded All my files from the client galkon on my site.But when i try to load java start perfect
then there only a red X on page.I checked Tools then java console(it was clean before)And look what it say

load: class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException:
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
It say class not found.
so i tryed sumting with jar maker.

So i changed the input directory to my website where class are but it wont let me create the jar.

Is there a way i can do ??if not can any1 gimme a WORKING TuT link for Webclient??
ps:im french.

Read full topic
